VR Controls:

Vive, Oculus not tested.
Touchpad, Trigger, or Grip: Grab and interact.
Remove pants by moving your hands!
Menu button: Quit to menu
Settings:
Teleport with touchpad (Not recommended)
Pants aim mode: Look based, or hand based.
Sensitivity: Pants sensitivity.
Spectate: a smooth or floating camera, requires a good GPU

PC Controls:
Mouse to look.
Spacebar: press to remove pants, release to put pants back on (also clicks menus).
Z & X (osu style): press either to change state of pants.
WASD: Move around for some reason.
Left click: Same as space.
Right click: Pick up.
M: Quit to menu
Esc: Quit

Cant run fast on your laptop?!? Set your Resolution scale to 0.5 and apply!

For automatic updates get the Itch.io App

Thank you, seriously, you the person reading this, you really are awesome.
